about.about_us_text: Mega Code Software is a software company founded in 2012 in Istanbul. Thanks to its experienced and expert team, the company not only provides software solutions but also digital solutions to businesses. By leveraging the services offered by technology and innovations, Mega Code becomes a solution partner for companies in all sectors and of all sizes. Not only in Turkey but also primarily in the United States and the United Kingdom, Mega Code engages in software exports to the entire world.
about.our_principles_text2: With the best service principle, you meet the consumption and answer all questions and difficulties.
about.sustainable_projects_text1: We take care that all the projects we offer are sustainable and developable.
about.ınnovation: We implement new ideas according to needs, produce dynamic products or carry out various services.
about.technology;: We use technology to provide you with the best and correct service.
about.kvkk_text: Your personal data, but not limited to those listed; General directorate, regional offices, our suppliers, business partners, authorized/official institutions, all private and official health persons, institutions, organizations, other insurance companies and other relevant third parties/institutions, such as internet branch, call center, closed circuit camera system and all other physical, written, verbal and electronic media/channels/channels personally and/or within your knowledge sent/provided/provided by you and/or within your knowledge, documents, resumes, written documents, resumes, written forms, written statements, written forms Your e-mail is obtained from e-mail, audio/video recordings, KVKK art. It can be processed and transferred based on your explicit consent, except for the cases stipulated in the provisions of Article 5/2 and 6/3 of the KVKK in accordance with the principles stipulated in the provisions of 4/2.
about.kvkk_text1: Rights Enumerated in Article 11 of KVKK
about.kvkk_text2: By applying to our company, your personal data;
about.kvkk_text3: Learning whether it is processed or not,
about.kvkk_text4: Requesting information about it if it has been processed
about.kvkk_text5: Learning the purpose of processing and whether it is used appropriately,
about.kvkk_text6: Knowing the 3 people to whom it was transferred in the country / abroad,
about.kvkk_text7: Requesting correction if it is incomplete/wrongly processed,
about.kvkk_text8: KVKK's art. Requesting deletion / destruction / anonymization within the framework of the conditions in 7,
about.kvkk_text9: Requesting notification of correction, deletion/destruction processes to the 3 persons to whom the data has been transferred,
about.kvkk_text10: Objecting to the emergence of a result against you because it is analyzed exclusively by automated systems,
about.kvkk_text11: We inform you that you have the right to demand the compensation of the damage in case you suffer damage due to unlawful processing, and inform you that we continue our activities with the awareness that personal data security is at the forefront in all our products and services we offer you.
about.kvkk_text13: You can use the Application Form at the link at the bottom of this clarification text to submit your requests regarding your rights mentioned above.
about.kvkk_text16: By registered letter with return receipt
about.kvkk_text17: Via notary public Turgut Özal mah. 68.Sk Otoport Avm Kat/8 No/247 Esenyurt / Istanbul with a wet signed copy or
about.kvkk_text18: You can send it by another method prescribed by the Personal Data Protection Board.
about.kvkk_h6: Your request will be evaluated and finalized as soon as possible and in any case within the time specified in the KVKK. In order for third parties to apply on your behalf, there must be a special power of attorney issued through a notary public on behalf of the applicant. If the process of examining and finalizing your application requires a cost, our Company may charge the fee in the tariff determined by the Board.
about.quality_certificates_text1: Thanks to the national and international quality certificates issued by independent audit institutions, Mega Code Yazılım A.Ş. reveals its difference in the Turkish IT Sector. It has allowed us to compete more sustainably and effectively.
about.quality_certificates_text2: Our quality certificates are an indication that we will meet customer expectations in the most appropriate and correct way and keep satisfaction at the forefront. While starting our adaptation process to the Integrated Management System, the corporate structure of Mega Code Yazılım A.Ş. was prepared accordingly.
about.title_desc: We produce digital solutions for your time and cost management.

about1.h6: Mega Code Software is a software company founded in 2012 in Istanbul. Thanks to its experienced and expert team, the company not only provides software but also produces digital solutions for businesses.
about1.h6_p: Through the services offered by technology and innovations, Mega Code collaborates with companies of all sectors and sizes as a solution partner. Mega Code not only operates in Turkey but also engages in software exports to various countries, including the United States and the United Kingdom, reaching out to the global market.

projects_services.h2_des_p: With MegaCode Software, we serve as Turkey's first and only insurance-themed digital agency, which believes in following the rapid development of technology and the priority of quality, and we use all innovative solutions of the digital world to grow your business.

faq.software_dev_desc: We determine your needs and projects. Since our applications are written exclusively for you, we take care to use up-to-date and stable technologies in line with your needs.
faq.software_dev_desc_title2: Do you provide the source codes of the project?
faq.software_dev_desc2: Yes, we give access to all code written during the software development process of your project. After the project is completed, we deliver all the codes to you.
faq.software_dev_desc_title3: Will we be able to get software support after project delivery?
faq.software_dev_desc3: All kinds of works produced and developed within the scope of the project are under MegaCode guarantee since the publication process. However, this warranty does not include any design or structural changes. After your project is completed, you can request maintenance and support services according to your needs.
faq.software_dev_desc_title4: Can I get information about the stage of the project implementation process?
faq.software_dev_desc4: Of course. You can get information about the software and design processes of the project at the meetings held periodically by the project manager.
faq.software_dev_desc_title5: Do you offer UI/UX design service?
faq.software_dev_desc5: Yes. We always value user experience and interface design processes. At your request, we create your user experience and interface designs specifically for your project.
faq.web_design_desc_title: WWill my eb site be responsive?
faq.web_design_desc: Yes. We ensure that your website is compatible with desktops, smartphones and tablets.
faq.web_design_desc_title2: Do you provide SEO/SEM services for the website?
faq.web_design_desc2: Yes. We develop your web design projects in accordance with 100% SEO infrastructure with special coding that can move your web design projects to the top of browsers such as Google, Bing, Yandex.
faq.web_design_desc_title3: Is the website fee a one-time fee?
faq.web_design_desc3: Yes, the website fee is a one-time fee. It is not repeated. You own your website.
faq.web_design_desc_title4: Will I have an admin panel?
faq.web_design_desc4: Yes, you will be the one who manages all the processes of your website. You can make any changes you want in seconds.
faq.mobil_app_dev_title: Will my mobile app work on all platforms?
faq.mobil_app_dev_desc: Yes, our mobile application, which we developed specifically for you, is delivered to run on IOS and Android platforms.
faq.mobil_app_dev_title3: Will I get software support later?
faq.mobil_app_dev_desc3: All kinds of works produced and developed within the scope of the project are under MegaCode guarantee since the publication process. However, this warranty does not include any design or structural changes. After your project is completed, you can request maintenance and support services according to your needs..
faq.mobil_app_dev_title4: Do you provide the source codes of the project?
faq.mobil_app_dev_desc4: Yes. We give access to all codes written during the software development process of your project. At the end of the project, we deliver all the codes to you.
faq.commercial_desc_title: Why is corporate identity work important?
faq.commercial_desc: Corporate identity represents the visible face of your company. It is necessary to accurately and effectively reflect the company image to the external environment. In this respect, it is necessary for you to successfully advertise your company.
faq.commercial_desc_title2: What is included in the content of corporate identity work?
faq.commercial_desc2: Logo, business card works, envelope, mug, pen, letterhead, agenda, calendar etc. in corporate identity work. has works. The study content can be expanded according to your wishes and needs.
faq.commercial_desc_title3: What if I don't like the corporate identity work you're going to do?
faq.commercial_desc3: Works prepared considering your wishes are presented in many options. We will continue to offer options until we find the most suitable work for you.
faq.commercial_desc_title4: Can I just get logo work?
faq.commercial_desc4: Of course. You can buy works according to your wishes and needs.
faq.social_media_desc_title: Which social media accounts do you manage?
faq.social_media_desc: We can manage all of your Instagram, Facebook and Twitter accounts or the accounts you want.
faq.social_media_desc_title2: Why would someone else manage my social media accounts?
faq.social_media_desc2: Managing your social media accounts by experts and competent people will positively affect the reputation and reliability of your company or brand. It will increase brand awareness and make it a platform where you can increase your sales.
faq.social_media_desc2_1: Our experts, who follow trends and current events with the same discipline, will be pleased to manage your social media accounts for you.
faq.social_media_desc_title3: How do you analyze social media accounts? What will be the advantages?
faq.social_media_desc3: We will present you the difference from your competitors with content, follower, interaction, feedback and advertisement analysis by presenting reports on which you can follow your progress in social media regularly every month. You will find the answers to your questions in our detailed reports.
faq.social_media_desc_title4: How do you manage social media accounts?
faq.social_media_desc4: First of all, we will determine the target audience and language of your social media and programmatically manage your accounts with original content sharing that reflects your identity.
faq.main_description: You can read the questions asked about general topics and curiosities below.

acente365.label1_question_answer1: Acente365, It is an innovative solution partner that enables you to manage all operations of agencies and brokers through a single system. Thanks to the system, you can easily receive services in many areas such as customer follow-up, offers, policies, renewals, cross-selling opportunities and collection follow-up.
acente365.label1_question_answer2: The cloud-based system gives you an advantage with its strong infrastructure. It makes your work easier thanks to its software prepared in accordance with international security standards and all legal regulations.
acente365.label1_question_answer3: In the infrastructure of Acente365  , you can receive, compare and policy your offers from 25 different insurance companies in 12 branches.
acente365.label2_question_answer1: All Kinds of Insurance Activities of the Whole Insurance Company on a Single Platform
acente365.label2_question_answer2: All insurance companies that brokerage houses work with; You can view all kinds of production activities such as from proposal to policy, reconciliations, renewals, reporting from a single screen in comparison.
acente365.label2_question_answer3: Customer Satisfaction with High Speed ​​and Alternative Offers
acente365.label2_question_answer4: Waiting for each insurance company separately on the offer screen and repetitive form filling processes are now a thing of the past. With Insurgateway, you can view all the product offers of all the insurance companies you work with on a single screen by filling out a form, you can view, policy and save time.
acente365.label2_question_answer6: The open insurance platform insurgateway, which was prepared in compliance with the legislation, applies these changes centrally for all companies when there are legislative changes and eliminates the risks.
acente365.label2_question_answer7: Contribution to Your Company's Intellectual Capital
acente365.label2_question_answer8: Acente365 provides you with technical consultancy on many issues such as how a data should be technologically, how a study can be done and how you can determine the right business needs. In this way, you can access all kinds of sectoral and technical information you need at the web service level in the insurance industry.
acente365.label3_question_answer1: Web Service Connection to Brokerage Institutions from a Single Platform
acente365.label3_question_answer2: We integrate the web services of all your insurance company's products and services into Agency365 and provide the integration to intermediary institutions. In this way, you do not have to provide integration support for each brokerage house separately.
acente365.label3_question_answer4: The Insurgateway team undertakes all the technical support workforce related to the integration process of your products and services for you and guarantees quality and continuous maintenance support in this process.
acente365.label3_question_answer6: Any product defined to Acente365; You can easily integrate many digital channels such as website, mobile, chatbot and smart robot into different channels.
acente365.label4_question: Open Insurance Platform for Insurance Intermediary Institutions
acente365.label4_question_answer1: Track all your insurance transactions from a single platform with the customer management system and manage all your customers' insurance-related needs!
acente365.label5_question_answer1: 1. You can get quotes from different insurance companies in 2 minutes.
acente365.label5_question_answer2: 2. You can compare offers on a single screen and see product details at the same time.
acente365.label5_question_answer3: 3. You can present the most accurate and up-to-date offers to the customer.
acente365.label5_question_answer4: 4. You can manage customer relations and respond quickly to their requests.
acente365.label5_question_answer5: 5.You can follow the policy renewals on the screen and present your offers instantly.
acente365.label5_question_answer6: 6. You can track your income and receivables.
acente365.label5_question_answer7: 7. You do not lose cross-selling opportunities and you can follow up with warning screens.
acente365.label5_question_answer8: 8. You can follow the collections, damage and premium rates on the screen.
acente365.label5_question_answer9: 9. You can quickly download policies and receipts from anywhere, anytime.
acente365.label_desc: You can manage all your operations through a single system!
acente365.text1: We continue to produce solutions for the insurance industry with hundreds of users across Turkey.
acente365.text3: Customer, Subsidiary, Production, Renewal List etc. You can access your important information from different devices such as computers, tablets and mobile devices.
acente365.text4: Thanks to the easy use of Acente365, you can learn the program easily and start your transactions quickly.
acente365.support_text: Thanks to our expert staff, we are with you in every problem you may experience and we produce solutions.
acente365.cloud: Acente365 is a Cloud Based System
acente365.acente_text1: Acente 365 makes your IT investment for you. All services such as server, security, license, antivirus are served.
acente365.acente_text2: Acente 365 is secure. Your personal data is safely stored in our data center and backed up daily.
acente365.acente_text3: Acente 365 is up to date. Every feature that is developed, the fix is ​​constantly updated for all users.
acente365.pricing_table_text: You can fill out our contact form to get detailed information about our products. Our expert teams will get back to you as soon as possible..
acente365.pricing_table_bronze_text: It is a cloud-based CRM system designed to manage your customer records, offers and policies, claims and collections..
acente365.pricing_table_silver_text: Get online comparative offers of Motor Insurance, Traffic, Dask, Complementary Health from the system.
acente365.pricing_table_silver_text2: Policy your bids and collect them. All on a single system and fully integrated with the CRM module.
acente365.pricing_table_gold_text: Unleash the power of your system. Get customers from the web and social media, give your customers the opportunity to make online offers and policies over the web.
